page_content: The page is focused on the research, processing, and dissemination of knowledge about the historical building stock in Graubünden.
The page provides guides and software for tax declaration for legal entities.
The page discusses the release of a DVD about the work of the Kantonspolizei Graubünden.
The page provides instructions for unlocking PINs on ATOS and Gemalto Smart-Cards.
The page provides information on optimizing hiking trail networks and related planning resources.
The page provides information about a training course on winMedio software for library management.
The page announces the support of new operating systems by SofTax GR 2009 for tax declarations.
The page appears to be a classification system for the Kantonsbibliothek Graubünden, but the content is not clearly discernible.
The page provides information on legislative projects related to taxation and mentions the need for Adobe Reader to view documents.
